name: 陳盈竹
objective:
This course is an introduction to basic storytelling and script planning.  By understanding the structure of narrative organization and design thinking process, students will be able to practice an interactive script design work from planning to analyzing and to finalize a visual work of story-telling script.
In class participation including brainstorming and discussion are evaluated.
schedule:
01 Introduction
02 Story brainstorming
03 Story Structure/ Story board
04 Story Structure/ Short story: Commercials
05 Story Structure/ Short story: Commercials
06 Sharing & Discussion
07 Planning a Story: Character
08 Planning a Story: Types of Story I
09 Planning a Story: Types of Story II
10 Planning a Story: Types of Story III
11 Planning a Story/ Heros' Journey: Stages I
12 Planning a Story/ Heros' Journey: Stages II
13 Planning a Story/ Heros' Journey: Stages III
14 Analysis of a movie story
15 Sharing and Discussion
16 Group Project
17 Final Review part I
18 Final Review part II
